vscode.name: Prettier
vscode.description: Prettier is a Code Formatter that help you to organize your code,and it Support a lot of Programming Languages.

vscode.name: Better Comments
vscode.description: Better comments is nice VS Code Extension that allow you to Write Nice and beautifull comments.

vscode.name: Indent Rainbow
vscode.description: If you work with a lot of lines of code, you may make a mistake like forget opening and closing tags or other mistakes, But with this extansion you will not make this mistake again.

vscode.name: JEST
vscode.description: If You use JEST Framework in Your Testing Process, This is nice extension for You, Jest EXtension giev you testing result withour run testing task in yoru Terminal.

vscode.name: Material Icon Theme
vscode.description: Nice Extension that give You nice and beatiful files icons, like javascript, python...etc, Material Icon Theme Extension supports Folders Icon too.

vscode.name: Path Intellisense
vscode.description: Excellent Extension that help you to handle paths in your imports, Autocomplete Filenames and more

vscode.name: Turbo Console Log
vscode.description: This Extension help you when you want to log some data in Console, It log data in console with some extra information like line, variable's name and more.

vscode.name: Tokyo Night
vscode.description: Nice Theme that I start Using in VS Code Editor, It have nice colors and other Features.

vscode.name: Snapcode
vscode.description: Nice Extension that help you to take beatiful snapshot to specific piece of code.

vscode.name: Rainbow Tags
vscode.description: Nice VS Code Extension that colorize HTML Tags, which help you to know start and end of the Tag.

vscode.name: DotENV
vscode.description: DotENV Extension give a nice colors to yor environment variables, Which maek your development is more easier.

vscode.name: Ayu
vscode.description: A nother Nice Theme for VS Code Editor that give you a Professional SHapeand Colors.

vscode.name: Headwind
vscode.description: The Big Problem in Tailwind CSS is that you may write a lot of classes and that make you to forget to oganize these classes, Headwind came to solve this problem, It ReArrange all Tailwind classes when you save the file.

vscode.name: Git Lens
vscode.description: Nice Extension that give you ability to handle your repos graphically and by easy way.

packages.name: Axios
packages.description: Axios is the most library that used in fetching data from APIs process, is has a lot of features and properties that ease fetching process.

packages.name: Lodash
packages.description: This Library you must use it, It is Great Library that have a lot of functions that will ease your work with javascript..

packages.name: Yargs
packages.description: Yargs helps you build interactive command line tools, by parsing arguments and generating an elegant user interface.

packages.name: Multer
packages.description: The Most popular Library that will help you in File upload handling, You can use it in some easy steps in You project.

packages.name: Telegraf
packages.description: Telegraf is a NPM package that give you ability to make telegram bot, It have tens of features that will give you ability to make your great telegram bot.

packages.name: Nightmare
packages.description: Great NPM library that you can use it in you web scraping work, It have a nice features that will give you what you need.

packages.name: bcrypt
packages.description: Nice Pckage that used in Authuntication and Authorization process, It used to hash password which give your application more security layer.

packages.name: Short ID
packages.description: Great NPM Package that make short and random text to use it in your projects, You can use it in URL Shortner Application for Example.

packages.name: Image Downloader
packages.description: Nice package that you can use it in to download images from web, It have easy way to implement in your Application.

packages.name: CORS
packages.description: One of the most popular problem in api calling from a nother origin is CORS problem, By this package you can control in origins that can make requests to your websites.

packages.name: Json Web Token
packages.description: One of the most popular pacjage that used to implement Authuntication and Authorization process in web Applications.

packages.name: Chalk
packages.description: Nice NPM Package that help you to edit Terminal text styles like changing text background ot text colors.

packages.name: Validator
packages.description: A library of string validators and sanitizers, It have a lot of valitor schemas like email, password, ...etc.

websites.name: JSON Placeholder
websites.description: Great Website that give you fake APIs End Points to use it in your applications.

programms.name: Roboto 3T
programms.description: Robot 3T is an nice Programm that help You to manage MongoDB local databases on Your machine which ease DB's Manage Process.

programms.name: VS Code
programms.description: The most populer code editor that every developer should used it at least once, It have all features that speed your development process.

programms.name: Sublime Text
programms.description: Another nice Code Editor that have nice and great features that will help you in your work as a Programmer.

programms.name: Atom

chrome.name: JSON Formatter

chrome.name: Grepper
chrome.description: Nice and very good chrome extension that help you in the development process by shoeing your problem solution in google search result, So You should try it.

chrome.name: Wappalyzer
chrome.description: As a developer sumtimes you want to know the technologies that used in a specific website, This extension solve this problem, It tell you every technologies that is used in any website.

chrome.name: Lorem Generator
chrome.description: We may need random text to test a frontend website and know how it will be, Lorem Generator Extension will solve this problem, It makes you random text with any length that you want.
